sentences.en: About one thousand years later, the twenty - eighth patriarch was Bodhidharma.
sentences.cn: 差不多一千年后, 禅宗 二十八 传至菩提达摩.

sentences.en: And the patriarch that regards Chinese news as the organization, Agency has an action early also.
sentences.cn: 而作为中国新闻机构的元老, 新华社也早有动作.

sentences.en: At first the patriarch Nicholas Mystikos regency.
sentences.cn: 因此一开始的时候,牧首尼古拉斯成为摄政王,主理朝政.

sentences.en: Greek patriarch of alexandria and leading defender of Christian orthodoxy against arianism.
sentences.cn: 达修亚历山大时期的希腊主教,是基督教正统教派反对阿里乌斯教义的主要保卫者.

sentences.en: Her patriarch is strict with her.
sentences.cn: 她的家长对她要求很严.

sentences.en: I thought of myself as a patriarch, dispensing words of wisdom to all my children.
sentences.cn: 我把自己当作在向子女传授至理名言的一家之长。

sentences.en: In Bagdad, Mark was Patriarch for all the cities of Cathay.
sentences.cn: 他们俩在巴格达时, 马尔谷被祝圣为“国泰各城市”的总主教.

sentences.en: Joseph Kennedy, the clan's patriarch, communicated with Bobby in a series of notes.
sentences.cn: 宗族族长约瑟夫·肯尼迪通过一系列便笺和博比交流。

sentences.en: One, he said, had been written by Abraham, the Jewish patriarch.
sentences.cn: 他说, 有一张是犹太始祖亚伯拉罕写的.

sentences.en: Patriarch Feng was Guru Chen's teacher in Tang Tantra.
sentences.cn: 冯大阿闍梨是陈上师的唐密教授师.

sentences.en: She suffers all pupil's patriarch's highly praising and respect.
sentences.cn: 她受到全体小学生家长的高度赞扬与尊敬.

sentences.en: The patriarch of the house, Mr Jawad, rules it with a ferocity renowned throughout the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 那户人家的家长贾瓦德先生治家严苛，名闻乡里。

sentences.en: The patriarch of the house, Mr. Jawad, rules it with a ferocity renowned throughout the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 那户人家的家长贾瓦德先生治家严苛，名闻乡里。

sentences.en: The Patriarch or Pope of Rome claimed to be the head of the entire Christian church.
sentences.cn: 罗马教皇声称是整个基督教会的头儿.

sentences.en: The patriarch paid him a handsome price.
sentences.cn: 族长给了他一笔可观的数目.

sentences.en: Who was the old patriarch of this family?

words.tran_cn: 家长的；族长的；由族长统治的
父权制；家长统治；父系社会

trans.tran_cn: 家长，族长，元老，（特指）犹太民族的祖先，创始人，鼻祖
trans.tran_en: an old man who is respected as the head of a family or tribe
